app.routes package

Submodules

app.routes.classifications module

app.routes.classifications.classifications()

API for selecting a model and an image and running a classification job. Returns the output scores from the model.

app.routes.classifications_id module

app.routes.classifications_id.classifications_id(job_id)

Returns the status and the result of the job identified by the id specified in the path.

app.routes.histogram module

app.routes.histogram.histogram()

App route which manage operations on image histogram.

Returns

The template with the histogram.

Return type

str

app.routes.home module

app.routes.home.home()

app.routes.info module

app.routes.info.info()

Returns a dictionary with the list of models and the list of available image files.

app.routes.transformation module

app.routes.transformation.transformation()

App route which manage operations on image transformation.

Returns

The template with base and transformed images.

Return type

str
